name: CGImageMetadataTag
desc: An immutable type that contains information about a single piece of image metadata.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataTagCreate(CFString, CFString?, CFString, CGImageMetadataType, CFTypeRef) -> CGImageMetadataTag?
items.desc: Creates a new image metadata tag, and fills it with the specified information.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataTagCopyNamespace(CGImageMetadataTag) -> CFString?
items.desc: Returns an immutable copy of the tag’s XMP namespace.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataTagCopyPrefix(CGImageMetadataTag) -> CFString?
items.desc: Returns an immutable copy of the tag’s prefix.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataTagCopyName(CGImageMetadataTag) -> CFString?
items.desc: Returns an immutable copy of the tag’s name.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataTagCopyValue(CGImageMetadataTag) -> CFTypeRef?
items.desc: Returns a shallow copy of the tag’s value, which is suitable only for reading.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataTagCopyQualifiers(CGImageMetadataTag) -> CFArray?
items.desc: Returns a shallow copy of the metadata tags that act as qualifiers for the current tag.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataTagGetType(CGImageMetadataTag) -> CGImageMetadataType
items.desc: Returns the type of the metadata tag’s value.

items.name: enum CGImageMetadataType
items.desc: Constants that indicate the XMP type for a metadata tag.

items.name: func CGImageMetadataTagGetTypeID() -> CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the type identifier for the image metadata tag opaque type
